title: T206 off back needs: I have cards to trade!

posts.post_title: T206 off back needs: I have cards to trade!
posts.post_content:
I am down to 3 cards left for a complete off-back binder:
MONTE CROSS (Impossible, I know)
Danny Hoffman (tough but doable)
George McBride (tough but doable)

ANYONE HAVE THESE?  I have this McElveen Cycle for trade as well as many others!
